Package rekit.logic.filters

Class GrayScaleMode

java.lang.Object
rekit.logic.filters.GrayScaleMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
@LoadMe
public final class GrayScaleMode
extends Object
implements Filter
This filter realizes a filter which will convert all colors to grayscale.
Author:
Dominik Fuchss
